items.sentence: People always make fun of me because of that.
Please tell me your version of what happened.
Do you want to eat something before we leave?
I think that you ought to ask Tom to do that.
Are you sure you want to do this by yourself?
Tom wants to know when we\'re going to leave.
Tom wants to know when we\'re going to start.
Tom wants to know why Mary isn\'t here today.
You\'re not really going to do that, are you?
You\'re not very good at doing that, are you?
You\'re not yet old enough to drink, are you?
I\'ll tell Tom what a tremendous job you did.
I\'ll be visiting Japan again in a few years.
I\'ll buy you one of those for your birthday.
I\'ll continue working here as long as I can.
What\'s the most famous college in the world?
Tom seemed to understand everything you said.
The bar was so crowded you could hardly move.
You are good at speaking French, aren\'t you?
After we finished eating, we went for a walk.
